meanings.sent1: Don't be a numskull and forget your lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: The numskull couldn't remember where he parked his car.
meanings.sent3: The numskull tried to use a fork to eat soup, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His head felt as empty as a numskull after staying up all night studying.
meanings.sent5: Being a numskull in math class is like being lost in a maze without a map.

meanings.sent1: The numskull accidentally put salt instead of sugar in the cake batter.
meanings.sent2: Everyone knew he was a numskull when he couldn't tie his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The numskull thought the moon was made of cheese and tried to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: Her stubbornness made her as thick-headed as a numskull.
meanings.sent5: His forgetfulness turned him into a numskull in the eyes of his friends.
